summary: This code snippet is using the iconv module to encode a Chinese content string, "央视暂停NBA转播," into gb2312 encoding. It also encodes it as a URI component and logs the result. The commented out line suggests that there was previously an attempt to use iconv for encoding but it has been removed or replaced with encodeURIComponent.
